TEXT.TITLE: TEXTRON <TXT> GETS 420.2 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Avco Lycoming, a division of Textron Inc, has been awarded a 420.2 mln dlr contract for work on 810 engines and spare parts for the M-1A1 tank, the Army said. REUTER
